item.title: Variational Method as Approximation to Simplify Quantum Circuit
item.description: Preview This blog provides a concise overview of some key noise-resilient, intermediate-scale quantum algorithms, designed for a general audience. We’ll first explore the core mechanics of these algorithms, followed by their applicability to existing classical counterparts. Lastly, we’ll discuss the hardware requirements necessary to implement these algorithms, with a focus on managing noise in quantum systems. Variational Quantum Eigenvalue (VQE) With the quantum hardware progressing, promising quantum algorithm has been devised to harness the exotic nature of quantum computer.
